authentication.notes: COMPLETELY FREE! Open source Linux distribution. Download ISO or use in cloud/VM. No registration or payment required.

popular_tools: Nmap - Network discovery and security auditing

description: Kali Linux - FREE comprehensive penetration testing platform with 600+ pre-installed security tools. The industry standard for ethical hacking and security assessments.

bash.kali_setup:
#!/bin/bash
# Kali Linux Quick Setup - FREE!

echo "[*] Kali Linux Setup (COMPLETELY FREE!)"
echo "======================================"
echo ""

echo "[+] Installation Options:"
echo "    - Virtual Machine (VMware/VirtualBox)"
echo "    - WSL2 on Windows"
echo "    - Docker Container"
echo "    - Live USB Boot"
echo "    - Cloud Instance"
echo "    - Raspberry Pi"
echo ""

echo "[+] Top Tools Included:"
echo "    - Nmap - Network scanning"
echo "    - Metasploit - Exploitation"
echo "    - Burp Suite - Web testing"
echo "    - Wireshark - Packet analysis"
echo "    - John/Hashcat - Password cracking"
echo "    - Aircrack-ng - WiFi auditing"
echo "    - SQLmap - SQL injection"
echo "    - 600+ more tools!"
echo ""

echo "[+] Quick Start Commands:"
echo "    # Update Kali"
echo "    sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y"
echo ""
echo "    # Install all tools"
echo "    sudo apt install kali-linux-large"
echo ""
echo "    # Install specific category"
echo "    sudo apt install kali-tools-web"
echo ""

echo "[+] Resources:"
echo "    - Docs: https://www.kali.org/docs/"
echo "    - Tools: https://www.kali.org/tools/"
echo "    - Training: https://kali.training/"
echo ""

echo "[!] 100% FREE - No license required!"

python.kali_tools_guide:
import subprocess
import os
from typing import Dict, List

class KaliToolsGuide:
    """Kali Linux Tools Guide - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://www.kali.org/tools'
        
    def essential_tools(self):
        """Essential Kali Linux tools (FREE!)"""
        print("== Essential Kali Linux Tools (ALL FREE!)\n")
        
        tools = {
            'Network Scanning': {
                'nmap': 'Network discovery and security auditing',
                'masscan': 'Fast port scanner',
                'netdiscover': 'Active/passive ARP reconnaissance',
                'arp-scan': 'ARP scanning and fingerprinting',
                'unicornscan': 'Asynchronous network stimulus delivery'
            },
            'Web Application': {
                'burpsuite': 'Web application security testing',
                'zaproxy': 'OWASP ZAP web app scanner',
                'nikto': 'Web server scanner',
                'dirb': 'Web content scanner',
                'gobuster': 'Directory/file/DNS busting',
                'wpscan': 'WordPress vulnerability scanner',
                'sqlmap': 'Automatic SQL injection'
            },
            'Exploitation': {
                'metasploit-framework': 'Penetration testing framework',
                'exploitdb': 'Exploit database archive',
                'beef-xss': 'Browser exploitation framework',
                'social-engineer-toolkit': 'Social engineering attacks',
                'powershell-empire': 'Post-exploitation framework'
            },
            'Password Attacks': {
                'john': 'John the Ripper password cracker',
                'hashcat': 'Advanced password recovery',
                'hydra': 'Network login cracker',
                'medusa': 'Parallel login brute-forcer',
                'crunch': 'Wordlist generator',
                'cewl': 'Custom wordlist generator'
            },
            'Wireless': {
                'aircrack-ng': 'WiFi security auditing',
                'wifite': 'Automated wireless attack',
                'fern-wifi-cracker': 'GUI wireless security tool',
                'kismet': 'Wireless detector and sniffer',
                'reaver': 'WPS brute force attack'
            },
            'Information Gathering': {
                'maltego': 'OSINT and graphical link analysis',
                'recon-ng': 'Web reconnaissance framework',
                'theharvester': 'Email, subdomain harvesting',
                'shodan': 'Internet device search',
                'spiderfoot': 'OSINT automation',
                'osrframework': 'OSINT gathering'
            }
        }
        
        for category, tool_list in tools.items():
            print(f"[+] {category}:")
            for tool, description in tool_list.items():
                print(f"    - {tool}: {description}")
            print()
        
        return tools

name: Kali Linux Tools

operational_guidance.value_proposition: The most comprehensive and trusted penetration testing platform with 600+ free tools, used by security professionals worldwide
